summary:
Alien Worlds Master the Metaverse - Alien Worlds is a Metaverse built by its community. Collect and play with NFTs, build with the Planetary Syndicates, and more!

 NFTs Series 2, Emergence Outpost Unveils Powerful New Tools - The mint race heats up with the release of ten new Tool NFTs, available in the Outpost.

 Attention landowners! MEGA Boost & SUPER Boost NFTs - NEW LAND BOOST OPTIONS ARE NOW AVAILABLE

 NFT Season 16 LESSONS IN LORE - Throughout the summer the Outpost has offered a fantastic variety of Alien Worlds NFTs for savvy Explorers to acquire for their personal collections...

 Galactic Hubs Pioneer Grants - Submit Your Pioneer Grant Application to Galactic Hubs Now!

 Now Live Join A Planetary Syndicate - Built on DAO technology, Planetary Syndicates have vast treasuries at their disposal to expand Alien Worlds.
